page.title: 12CHANGES IN MISSON
page.content: I interviewed an old lady in Misson to find out what had changed.Her father used to to be a Miller.Transport was much the same but "old fashioned".A few buildings have gone and a lot have been built.The landscape has changed.In 1942 the mill was pulled down.In 1962 the old school was left for the new one.She thought that the quarrying had spoilt the land too.a paddle steamer used to go up and down the river.The ferry would take you up to Everton for tuppence.The floods were bad and at one time you could skate over the fields.The winters were very severe but the summers were good.The roads were much better than they are now without the lanes to spoil them.
